text_block_list.name: Light Hearted Umas
text_block_list.text:
— The instructor then～ 
— For real? That's so real.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: — T-they've finished eating and it is lunch time right now… I should… call out to them.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: … Alright! Just thinking about it won't do any good. If I admire heroes, then I need to be a little brave!

text_block_list.name: Light Hearted Umas
text_block_list.text:
— You do the homework? 
— Nah～ Not feeling like using so much brain today～

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Uuu. 
B-but… how do I approach them…

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: — If you two have finished eating, then clear out.

text_block_list.name: Light Hearted Uma
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ah! Sorry! 
We were just leaving～!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: W-wow…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, Yuni! Hello, I was just about to go to your room and get you—

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
— Damn it! Tran! Don't mess with me! 
That bag of candy was mineeeee!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Rob Roy! Wanna join in? 
It's an intense game with treasure on the line!

"Observation". It looks "fun" and "prizes" are involved. 
Should we "CLNG"?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I-it does, doesn't it. However… 
I never played this game before—

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Aruvu! Come play! 
Your fellow classmates are playing too!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: I'm good.

text_block_list.name: Group mate Uma
text_block_list.text: H-having a joint cooking lesson for the 2nd years is quite troublesome, isn't it. Who's making what?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah. Um… H-how are 
we going to decide?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
I will make the main course. 
The rest of you will make the sides. Decide who makes what yourselves.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Hah… 
What should I do to be like her…

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
? "Theory". 
Zenno Rob Roy, is something "bothering" you?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: T-there is. The thing is…

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
— Hey. 
Don't block the hallway.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Wah, S-Still!? 
I'm sorry, I'll move right away!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Aruvu, could you please teach me… well… 
You know, I've always been—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
… Huh!? 
S-she's not here…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
— Ah, Aruvu! 
Hah, hah… P-please wait a second!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
W-well, thank you for earlier! 
… And the thing is, well, um—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: What can I do to act dignified like you… is that possible!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: W-whenever I'm in front of a crowd, I lose all my confidence… so that's why—

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: — I have no interest.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: … Huh?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
If it isn't important, I have no interest. 
… Who cares what people see or think.
I was walking in the hallway to convey something to <chrname> when…

text_block_list.name: Still in Love
text_block_list.text:
I see. Aruvu did something like that. 
But… I think she's a little mysterious.

text_block_list.name: Still in Love
text_block_list.text:
Well… I feel like she notices things about me before anyone else does… Someone who really pays attention to 
her surroundings.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Q". Admire Groove has "no interest in her surroundings". But she's "good at noticing things"?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
S-she certainly is a little mysterious, isn't she. 
… Although next time, I wonder if I'd be able to talk to her.
